generatedTitle: The 1987 ICC World Cup: The First with a Title Sponsor

extractFactDictList.question: When was the first ICC World Cup hosted outside England?
extractFactDictList.sentence: The first ICC World Cup hosted outside England was in 1987, and it was jointly held in India and Pakistan.

extractFactDictList.question: What was the official name of the ICC World Cup in 1987?
extractFactDictList.sentence: This tournament was officially known as the Reliance Cup 1987 for sponsorship reasons[^10^].

extractFactDictList.question: Who was the title sponsor of the ICC World Cup in 1987?
extractFactDictList.sentence: The title sponsor was Reliance Industries Ltd, an Indian company that is one of the largest and most diversified conglomerates in the world[^10^].

extractFactDictList.question: What was significant about the title sponsor of the ICC World Cup in 1987?
extractFactDictList.sentence: This was the first time the Cricket World Cup had a title sponsor[^10^].
extractFactDictList.phrase: It was the first time the Cricket World Cup had a title sponsor
